about_the_game:
GeoSlider is an educational, geography-themed puzzle game. The goal is to find misplaced continent pieces or islands and slide them back to their proper locations as quickly as possible. As you progress, you will improve your navigational skills and gain a better understanding of the locations and sizes of different regions of the Earth.

The game includes a puzzle pack with puzzles that range from simple to more demanding. It can be played in two modes:

Challenge mode
  • Puzzles have a time limit that increases as they become more difficult
  • For each correctly placed piece, the remaining time is extended

Relaxed mode
  • The time limit is disabled, take as much time as you need
